title: Mens Grooming in Argentina Published
text:
(MENAFN Press) Men's grooming is less developed in Argentina but in the review period companies undertook major launches and advertising campaigns. Men are traditional customers and concentrate their demand towards products such as shaving hair care and deodorants. The global trend shows that demand for men's grooming is increasing. In Argentina the rate is lower but positive.
Euromonitor International's Men's Grooming in Argentina report offers a comprehensive guide to the size and shape of the market at a national level. It provides the latest retail sales data 2010-2014 allowing you to identify the sectors driving growth. Forecasts to 2019 illustrate how the market is set to change.
